title: View categories
content:
The Category page shows all categories. Follow these steps to view the Category page:

  1. From the main menu, click Administration > Master Data > Categories.
  2. The Category page lists all categories arranged in column format. You may search for a category by entering a text string in the search box at the top of the column.
  3. As you select an individual category, Service Management displays any existing subcategories on the right side.

Limitation

The Category page can display up to 2000 Category records.
